title: name and shame selling in game content be ashamed
body: plz get rid of him and IP block the other accounts he is trying to sell

replies.body: How would those accounts have Triumphant Ryze?

There are local torny's that run it as a prize.
I've heard of at least 2.

Yes, the thing is that's the only way to get Triumphant Ryze, winning tournaments.

You couldn't possibly get Triumphant Ryze on throw away accounts.
Who says it's a throw away account if they have pax skins?

Pretty much.
It could be someone who's become fed up and decided they want to quit for good.
I really wish Pax Jax was available again somehow, I want it because it looks awesome... Ah well :P
